Cagerium.text:
mod!

Cagerium is a "one block solution" for mob farming. It comes with three different tiers of cages, the first one handling passive animals, the second one aggressive mobs and the third one boss mobs! It will output the loot of the mobs in an inventory underneath the cages.

Easy Piglins.text:
mod!

This mod turns piglin bartering in to a one block solution! Simply pick up a piglin by shift+right-clicking them, and put them in their box. Provide them with gold and they will output their trades in the inventory of the block. It doesn't get easier!

Ghost Walk.text: You become invulnerable from mobs for a short

of time.
Attacking anything during a Ghost Walk cancel the effect.

Mob Spawners.text:
!

iSpawners are quicker than vanilla spawners and can be configured with a mob egg to spawn the mob you want. Mob eggs can be swapped out whenever you want to.

Automatic Genius.text:
from various mods!

With Automatic Genius you can automate one of the two core concept of the game; crafting. Behold the power of full automation!

Botany Pots.text:
mod!

These pots can automate any crop in the game very easily by growing them in tiny pots.

Vault Compass.text:
!

This is the ideal tool for anyone getting lost inside the vault. While in your inventory the compass will always point to the start portal of any vault.

Thermal Expansion.text:
mod!

A multipurpose mod that can double ores, increase efficiency of wood logs as well as produce some items from scratch!

Thermal Dynamos.text:
from Thermal Expansion!

Dynamos are easy to use
generators that can be upgraded and generate power out of most things, even food and enchanted books!

Mekanism QIO.text:
from Mekanism!

This part of Mekanism is a full blown storage system, with massive digital storage disks, powerful and intelligent item transfer and highly customisable crafting utilities Mekanism QIO is a beast of any storage systems.

Digital Miner.text:
from Mekanism!

Automatic Mining at it's finest. Place this guy down, select your filters and upgrade modules, provide it with
and watch it dig out all your treasures!

Mining Gadgets.text:
mod!

Ever wanted to mine super quick using a laser rifle? If the answer is yes, then this mod is for you. Break blocks faster and at a further distance than you thought was possible with this

Weirding Gadgets.text:
mod!

This mod allows you to

a chunk, allowing your farms to run when you are not nearby or even offline. Weirding Gadgets will however turn itself off when you have been offline for longer than 12 hours. If you are playing on a server, use the mod with caution as it can very quick lag the server out for your server members if over-used.

Building Gadgets.text:
mods!

Building gadgets is a mega fun mod that allows you to place hundreds of blocks very quickly! A must have for any mega base builder. Building Gadgets does require
to operate, and can be charged through Enercell (which are also included in this unlock) but make sure you have access to

Pipez.text:
mod!

Transfering items around has never been easier! Pipez is the perfect entry point to any basic automation with item transfers, perfect for your farms or your generators!

Mekanism.text:
mod!

Mekanism is a high tech mega mod! It provides you with ore processing, making you able to quintuple the outcome of a raw ore, super fast smelters and crushers and much more. Some features of Mekanism, such as the

Botania.text:
mod!

Botania is a high tech mod that is based around it's own energy mana (not to be confused with Vault Mana). It can help you build advanced redstone contraptions, duplicate items and much more, however,
in Vault Hunters when it comes to player enhancing items, all of which we have disabled.

Botania Flux Field.text: The Flux Field enables you to turn mana into RF to be used in other mods, like Mekanism etc.

Mekanism Generators.text:
mod!

Mekanism Generators is an addon for the Mekanism mod, but if you ever need to produce unmeasurable amounts of
then this is the mod for you. It comes complete with

Flux Networks.text:
mod!

This mod doesn't actually have the capability to generate any Forge Energy (FE), but it can
it! Flux Networks can transfer energy easily wirelessly and allows you to build up great energy deposits and even secure them from other players.

Powah.text:
mod!

Powah has a great depth and variety of

generation. You can build simple generators, passive generators, solar panels and even reactors. Powah also provides power cables and wireless power transfer that can be used to better manage the Forge Energy of your base.

Iron Generators.text:
mod!

Iron Generators are a great entry point to
that is required by other mods to run. While Iron Generators is fairly basic, it can certainly be the best choice for early to mid game power generation!

Junk Management.text:
!

This controller allows you to specify 9 items by default that will be automatically deleted on pickup inside a vault. The Junk Controller can also be upgraded, although expensively, to handle up to a stunning 2052 items!

Big Backpacks.text:
from Sophisticated Backpacks!

This is as big as they get! Big Backpacks comes with 7 upgrade slots and this research also gives you access to the
. The feeding upgrade can automatically feed you while wearing the backpack, and the advanced void upgrade gives you even more slots to automatically void overflow with.

Backpacks.text:
from Sophisticated Backpacks!

Small Backpacks are, you guessed it, bigger than Double Pouches! They also come with 2 more upgrade slots, and this research also unlocks the

, which is the final one. All of these advanced upgrades gives you more control over the module, while the stack upgrade gives you even more storage per slot. Perhaps the most interesting upgrade is the Void Upgrade, allowing you to automatically void any overflow in up to 9 different slots per module.

Double Pouches.text:
from Sophisticated Backpacks!

Double pouches are bigger, and come with one more upgrade slot than pouches. This also unlocks the
making you able to stack even more items in one slot, as well as the
, which can automatically refill a slot, or several slots, in your inventory with your specified block.

Pouches.text:
from Sophisticated Backpacks!

Pouches are your entry tool for better loot management inside a vault or on other adventures. This research also unlocks the ability to craft the
module for the belts, which can allow the belts to automatically pick up items, as well as stack more than just one stack in a slot.

Belts.text:
from Sophisticated Backpacks!

Belts are bigger than double pouches, but has the same amount of upgrade slots. This does however unlock the
allowing you to store even more items in one slot, as well as the

which allows you to filter items being picked up using NBT & damage values.
In addition it also allows new technology in the form of the

.
The Filter Upgrade will allow you to set a whitelist or blacklist for extracting/inserting items through pipes in to your backpack, the Deposit Upgrade allows you to quickly empty your backpack by right-clicking it on an inventory and the Restock Upgrade allows you to restock certain items from an inventory by right-clicking it with the backpack.

Colossal Chests.text:
mod!

Colossal chests allows you to build massive chests that can store a lot of items in them.

More Chests.text:
mods

All of these three mods offer bigger chests and storage options without automation

Pretty Pipes.text:
mod

This mod offers basic automation for storage systems, pipes that can funnel items as well as a very basic digital interface to search through your chests.

Drawers.text:
mod!

This mod can store multiple (thousands) of stacks of one item in one block, and drawers can be chained together to create an array of storage.

RFTools Storage.text:
mod

This is a semi basic digital storage solution, that allows you to search items and store them on disk drives. It is far more limiting than it's similarities, Applied Energistics and Refined Storage, but is cheaper to manage early and mid game.

Refined Storage.text:
mod!

This mod lets you store your items on digital data disks, like harddrives. It has a digital search terminal.
is known for it's simplicity when it comes to digital networking but have some limiting factors because of it. Auto Crafting is possible but gated behind

Applied Energistics.text:
mod!

This mod lets you store your items on digital data disks, like harddrives. It has a digital search terminal.
is a bit more complex than it's similarity, Refined Storage, but has less limitations end game. Auto Crafting is possible but gated behind

Furniture.text:
mods

These mods provides you with some fun and useful furniture as well as Bamboo Spikes that can be very useful in mob farms.

Decorator.text:
mods

These mods provides you with a bunch of neat looking blocks, angled blocks and special doors and windows.

More Lights.text:
mod

This mod gives you a few more options when it comes to lighting

Chef.text:
mod

This mod provides you the ability to build a real kitchen in Minecraft, that can also be automated with the use of it being a multiblock.

RFTools Power.text:
mod

This mod generates power through a few different options using fuel.
Note, requires machine cases from RFTools Base

Easy Villagers.text:
mod!

This mod allows you to store, and interact, with villagers in block form, making it easy and fun to set up trading halls. It can also be used to farm resources with villagers, including iron.

SNAD.text:
mod!

Snad is a block of sand with special powers that increases crop speed of the crops (Sugar Cane / Cactus) placed on top of it automatically.

Quarry.text:
mod

The Builder can be used to excavate huge areas and quarrying up all the resources. It can also be used to build things very quickly.
Note, this mod requires machine bases from RFTools Base

Garden Cloche.text:
from Immersive Engineering

This is not a full mod unlock and requires you to also unlock
The Garden Cloche can grow crops for you using power (FE) to very quickly make simple farms of most growable blocks in Minecraft.
Note, this mod requires infrastructure from Immersive Engineering

Phytogenic Insulator.text:
from Thermal Expansion!

This is not a full mod unlock and requires you to also unlock
The Phytogenic Insulator can duplicate/generate a lot of farmable items for you using power (FE).
Note, this mod requires infrastructure from Thermal Expansion.

Create.text:
mod!

This mod allows you to farm and process resources. It does not require classic modded power (FE), but instead uses rotational force through water or heat sources to generate energy for itself.

Industrial Foregoing.text:
mod

This mod has a lot of machinery that are able to help with many different tasks. They all run off of power (FE) and can help produce materials, in mob farms and even with enchanting and disenchanting.

Immersive Engineering.text:
mod

This mod can both produce power, process ores and generate some resources. It uses big multistructures that all consume power (FE) to run.

Engineers Decor.text:
mod

This mod adds a lot of industrial decoration, as well as entry level power generation and processing.

Iron Furnaces.text:
mod!

This mod provides you with upgrades furnaces, making your smelting processing much quicker.

RFTools Base.text:
mod!

This mod doesnt provide much on it's own, but is required to make the machine cases for all other RFTools Mods.

Xnet.text:
mod!

Xnet is a very powerful infrastructural mod, allowing you to transfer items, power (fe), fluids and redstone through one single pipe. It requires in game "programming" to work, but can make your contraptions considerably smaller and more efficient.

Modular Routers.text:
mod!

This mod can help you transfer both items and experience wirelessly. It provides you with the ability to pick up things from the floor and is very useful in mob farms.

Dark Utilities.text:
mod!

This mod provides you with the ultimate utilities for mob farming and moving entities around using conveyour belts.

Waystones.text:
mod!

Waystones provides you with an ease of travel option. They are craftable and can be interacted with only after you unlock this research. You can travel within and cross-dimensions, however, they do not work in the vaults.

Torch Master.text:
mod!

A very small but useful mod that allows you to craft torches and lamps that can block both hostile and passive mob spawning in an area of 64 blocks around it. This can not be used in the vaults to prevent mobs from spawning however.

Trashcans.text:
mod!

This mod provides you with easy to use trashcans, where you can void not just items, but excess fluids and energy (FE) as well.

Elevators.text:
mod!

This mod provides you with ways of travelling vertically. The basic Elevators, when placed vertically from one another within a certain distance gives you the ability to SHIFT / JUMP on them to go DOWN / UP.

RFTools Utility.text:
mod

This mod provides you with some good infrastructural options and most importantly it supports wireless redstone signals using infinite different channels. Very useful for making your contraptions neater and more efficient.
Note, this research requires machine bases from RFTools Base

Dimensional Storage.text:
mod

This mod allows you to transfer items wirelessly from one dimensional chest to another. It can be used as public inventories and as private inventories. Very useful for farms instead of piping items all over the place. This mod however, does not work in the vaults.

Jetpacks.text:
mod

This mod allows you to craft jackpacks that can be used to fly, they work inside vaults and fuel out of power (FE)

Danks.text:
mod

Provides you with large storage cubes (danks) that can hold thousands of items per slot. They are very useful for organising your inventory and for mass looting vaults.

Extendo Arm.text:
from the Create mod

The Extendo Arm is an off hand item that will extend your reach, both block placement/breaking reach as well as fighting reach for mobs.
In addition to this research you will need the

Powerful Arrows.text:
mod

This includes better arrows so that your bow will still be useful in the vault in mid game. You can craft explosive arrows, piercing arrows, high damage arrows among others. In addition, this allows you to craft the very special "Rocket Arrow", turning your bow in to a TUBBO-Launcher

Trader.text:
, allowing them to be part of your base and sell you things that are useful.
Each level in this talent increases the quality of the trades. Upon reaching the final level, there is a chance that
are "Salesmen" instead, working for you to obtain Vault Gold.

Vault Blacksmith.text: Unlocks the ability for you to craft and work with
. Without this research you can still wear and roll
you find, but you can not craft it. In addition, some other useful utilities are unlocked, such as the

Vault Powerups.text: . This research is also required in order to consume

Vault Looter.text: Vault Charm and the Inscription Table

The Vault Charm Inscription Table allows you to 'voidlist' any item you want in your base, and while carrying the Vault Charm in your inventory it will automatically void any matching blocks or items that gets picked up, keeping your inventory clean and neat!

Adding an item to the void list inside the Charm Inscription Table will void any item regardless of sub-data (for example enchanted books), so beware of what you add!

Vein_Miner.text: Vein mine several blocks at once, used by holding down the ability key while breaking blocks.

Self_Sustain.text:
Eat your own flesh to replenish food, at the cost of taking some damage.

1:

Mega Jump.text: Launch yourself high up in the sky with a mega jump.
scales with levels in Mega Jump.

Elvish.text: Permanently remove all possible fall damage.

Angel.text: and have them grant you Creative Flight. Angel blocks can not be placed inside vaults, and have a radius of 64 blocks per block.

Reach.text: for interacting with blocks, chests and other tile entities in the game.

Safety First.text: Unlocks the Torchmaster Mod allowing you to prevent the natural spawning of mobs.

Organisation.text: Unlocks the Trashcans, Dank storage and PickleTweaks Mods.

Storage Noob.text: Unlocks the Iron chests and Metal barrels Mods.

Storage Master.text:
Unlocks the Storage Drawers, Modular Routers and storage overhaul Mods. 
To unlock Storage Master, you must unlock the Storage Noob research first.

Storage Refined.text:
Unlocks the Refined Storage, Refined Storage adds Mods. 
To unlock Storage Refined, you must unlock the Storage Master research first.

Storage Energistic.text:
Unlocks the Applied Energistics and addons Mods. 
To unlock Storage Energistic, you must unlock the Storage Master research first.

Decorator Pro.text:
Unlocks the Macaw's all mods, Environmental Materials, Block Carpentry and Platforms Mods. 
To unlock Decorator Pro, you must unlock the Decorator research first.

Engineer.text: Unlocks the Engineer's Decor and Iron Furnaces Mods.

Super Engineer.text: Unlocks Immersive Engineering and the Moving Elevators Mod!

One with Ender.text: Unlocks the Ender mail and Elevators Mods.

The Chef.text: Unlocks the Cooking for Blockheads Mod!

World Developer.text: Unlocks RFToolsBase and Comforts, so you can develop the world while sleeping outside.

Redstoner.text: Unlocks the Gauges and Switches, and RFToolsUtility Mods.

Let there be light!.text: Unlocks the Simplylight and Neoncraft Mods.

Power Overwhelming.text: mod! A mod capable of generating massive amounts of power through various different systems.

Power Manager.text: mod, allowing you to transfer energy wirelessly and overview any FE/RF consumption and production.

Uber Sand.text: mod, which gives you a new block, Snad, which increases growth tick speed for anything placed on it.

Piper.text: mod, which gives you access to a very simple digital storage solution using pipes. This mod can also be used to transfer items between containers.

Creator.text: mod, a mod with lots of utility to create automation, FE/RF independantly.

Nuclear Power.text:
Unlocks the MekanismGenerators mod! 
To unlock Nuclear Power, you must unlock the Tech Freak research first.

You summon Eternals from their pool of Eternals on eternal pedestals.
The eternal summoned is completely random, if an eternal dies in the vault they need to be ressurected in their cryo chamber, using a life scroll, before they can be summoned again.
There is also a
that an ancient spawns instead of an eternal if you own at least one ancient.
scales with levels in Summon Eternal.

Test Dummies.text:
mod

This mod offers the ability to make Test Dummies that can be used to test your damage and trigger ability of your vault gear.

Soul_Hunter.text:

Laser Mining.text:
from Industrial Foregoing.

This is not a full mod unlock and requires you to also unlock

.

The Ore Laser can generate any resources and focus down specific resources that generates in the world using lenses. It is a very powerful mining tool and with a powerful enough FE generation it is the best resource generator in Vault Hunters.

Fairy Lights.text:
mod.

Fairy Lights supplies the player with amazing looking lights for decoration and function. They can be hung up in threads and turn your base in to a masterpiece!

Simple Storage Network.text:
Networks mod.

Simple Storage Networks, is a mod that lets you connect up several inventories and browse their content from a central interface digitally, with a search function.

Note, because of performance issues we have disabled more advanced features of this mod, such as Crafting Interface, Export/Import capabilities and Wireless capabilities.
